mapper.select: SELECT f.food_no_pk FROM food_tab_tb ft INNER JOIN food_tb f ON f.food_no_pk=ft.food_no_fk WHERE tag_no_fk in ( SELECT tag_no_fk FROM food_tb f INNER JOIN food_tag_tb ft ON f.food_no_pk=ft.food_no_fk WHERE f.food_no_pk=#{bottleNo}) AND ft.food_no_fk != #{bottleNo} GROUP BY food_no_fk ORDER BY count(tag_no_fk) DESC
